clients.title: Get Found on the Justia Lawyer Directory
description: People searching for a lawyer on the Justia Lawyer Directory may now filter their search results based on a number of parameters to find a lawyer who best fits their needs. If you don't yet have a Justia Lawyer Rating, you risk getting filtered out by users looking only for highly ranked lawyers. Don't get lost in the shuffle; ask colleagues familiar with your work to write you a review!

jld.title: Add a Narrative Bio to Your Free Justia Lawyer Directory Profile
description: We recommend adding a well-written biography to your JLD profile that highlights your practice and shows off your passion for the law. While you may discuss your educational and professional experience, this section is really targeted for weaving a narrative about your entire practice so that a potential client can understand you and your law firm in a way that mere biographical facts cannot communicate.
